title: What is a User?
content: - A user is anyone who interacts with a product or service.
Users can be individuals, groups, or even machines.
image_desc: A person using a smartphone to access a website.
narration: Aap yeh soch rahe honge ki user kya hota hai? Aasaan shabdo mein, koi bhi jo kisi product ya service ka use karta hai, woh user hota hai. Yeh ek individual, ek group, ya ek machine bhi ho sakta hai.

title: User Examples
content: A software developer using a programming language.
image_desc: A group of people working on a computer together.
narration: Jaise ki, ek website pe browsing karne wala vyakti, kisi product ko kharidne wala customer, ya ek software developer jo programming language use karta hai, yeh sab user hote hain.
